metadata.title: Ziqiang He's Website
metadata.description: Ziqiang He's personal space, a world full of creativity and technology

home.description: I am a full-stack enginer with 9 years of experience. I previously worked as technical expert in companies such as RedNote and Alibaba. Recently, I have been focusing on AI applications. This is an era of great change. Let's exchange ideas, technologies, and opportunities together.

about.title: Hey! I'm Ziqiang
about.intro1: I'm a full-stack engineer with 9 years of development experience, currently based in Hangzhou, China.
about.intro2: I previously worked as Staff Frontend Engineer at Alibaba and RedNote. I have led the architecture design and development of billion-level traffic systems, specializing in extreme performance optimization.
about.intro3: Over the past few years, I have fully embraced the AI technology wave, from programming assistance to implementing 'AI models virtual try-on' project.
about.intro4: I'm Fluent in English and experienced in collaborating with cross-functional teams across North America, Singapore, and India. I Also have 3 years of team management experience (with 8-10 people).
about.intro5: I enjoy exploring new technologies, and I find great satisfaction in the problem-solving process. In my spare time, I love outdoor activities such as hiking, cycling, and shooting. Welcome to connect and exchange ideas.
about.urbanicDescription: Responsible for the core e-commerce system development and architecture, including mobile, PC, and CRM back-end. Promoted the establishment of the AI innovation department, and launched the 'AI model virtual try-on' project.
about.rednoteDescription: Responsible for enterprise efficiency department SaaS product development. Breaking down information silos and improving office efficiency through information aggregation and process engines. Introduced LRU/OT collaborative algorithms to solve performance bottleneck issues.
about.alibabaDescription: Participated in the design of Alibaba Double 11 page building system, including page building, data delivery, and traffic monitoring. As a cornerstone system, it handled billions of traffic from 2017-2020 Double 11. Later responsible for Alibaba's digital operation quick-build project, saving more than 5 million in costs.
about.teambitionDescription: This is a startup company full of passion, with an excellent team and project management products. I participated in the journey from Series A to Series C, responsible for the development of Node.js services for the enterprise version, covering functions such as project management, task management, and document management. And Led the design of the enterprise-level role and permission control system.
about.universityName: East China University of Science and Technology
about.universityDescription: Bachelor of Science, Top-tier Chinese University (985/211)

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: These are some of the projects I have completed recently, including both company projects and personal projects. Welcome any discussions.
